grants.description: Verify your identity using your GOV.UK One Login credentials
grants.purpose: To confirm you are who you say you are before processing the renewal

grants.description: Share your passport photo with DVLA for the new licence
grants.purpose: DVLA will use your most recent passport photo for the new licence card

grants.description: Confirm your current address for the licence and DVLA records
grants.purpose: The new licence will be posted to this address and it will appear on the licence

revocation.mechanism: Contact DVLA or revoke through your GOV.UK account
revocation.effect: Application will be cancelled if consent is revoked before completion

delegation.limitations: Agent cannot make payment on your behalf. Agent cannot change your address without your explicit confirmation.
